<li id="cite_note-649"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-649">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B9%9D%E5%B1%8A%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E5%A4%A7%E4%BC%9A%E5%B8%B8%E5%8A%A1%E5%A7%94%E5%91%98%E4%BC%9A" title="第九届全国人民代表大会常务委员会">第九届全国人民代表大会常务委员会</a>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.gov.cn/ziliao/flfg/2005-08/31/content_27920.htm">中华人民共和国国家通用语言文字法</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9C%8B%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C" title="中华人民共和国政府">中华人民共和国政府</a>. 2005-08-31 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-02-17</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210124091039/http://www.gov.cn/ziliao/flfg/2005-08/31/content_27920.htm">存档</a>于2021-01-24） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.au=%E7%AC%AC%E4%B9%9D%E5%B1%86%E5%85%A8%E5%9C%8B%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E5%A4%A7%E6%9C%83%E5%B8%B8%E5%8B%99%E5%A7%94%E5%93%A1%E6%9C%83&amp;rft.btitle=%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E9%80%9A%E7%94%A8%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80%E6%96%87%E5%AD%97%E6%B3%95&amp;rft.date=2005-08-31&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9C%8B%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gov.cn%2Fziliao%2Fflfg%2F2005-08%2F31%2Fcontent_27920.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-650"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-650">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">《<a href="https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9C%8B%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E9%80%9A%E7%94%A8%E8%AA%9E%E8%A8%80%E6%96%87%E5%AD%97%E6%B3%95" class="extiw" title="s:中华人民共和国国家通用语言文字法">中华人民共和国国家通用语言文字法</a>》. 北京: <a href="/wiki/%E5%85%A8%E5%9C%8B%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E4%BB%A3%E8%A1%A8%E5%A4%A7%E6%9C%83%E5%B8%B8%E5%8B%99%E5%A7%94%E5%93%A1%E6%9C%83" class="mw-redirect" title="全国人民代表大会常务委员会">全国人民代表大会常务委员会</a>. 2000年10月31日 <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="中文">（简体中文）</span>.</span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-658"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-658">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="聯合國教育、科學及文化組織統計司" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="UNESCO Institute for Statistics"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%81%AF%E5%90%88%E5%9C%8B%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E3%80%81%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%B8%E5%8F%8A%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96%E7%B5%84%E7%B9%94%E7%B5%B1%E8%A8%88%E5%8F%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="联合国教育、科学及文化组织统计司（页面不存在）">联合国教育、科学及文化组织统计司</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UNESCO_Institute_for_Statistics" class="extiw" title="en:UNESCO Institute for Statistics"><span lang="en" dir="auto">UNESCO Institute for Statistics</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SE.ADT.LITR.ZS/countries/CN-4E-XT?display=graph">Adult literacy rate, population 15+ years, both sexes (%)</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E9%8A%80%E8%A1%8C" class="mw-redirect" title="世界银行">世界银行</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-22</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160410221045/http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SE.ADT.LITR.ZS/countries/CN-4E-XT?display=graph">存档</a>于2016-04-10） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-659"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-659">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="聯合國教育、科學及文化組織統計司" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="UNESCO Institute for Statistics"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%81%AF%E5%90%88%E5%9C%8B%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E3%80%81%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%B8%E5%8F%8A%E6%96%87%E5%8C%96%E7%B5%84%E7%B9%94%E7%B5%B1%E8%A8%88%E5%8F%B8&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="联合国教育、科学及文化组织统计司（页面不存在）">联合国教育、科学及文化组织统计司</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UNESCO_Institute_for_Statistics" class="extiw" title="en:UNESCO Institute for Statistics"><span lang="en" dir="auto">UNESCO Institute for Statistics</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SE.SEC.ENRR/countries/CN-4E-XT?display=graph">Gross enrolment ratio, secondary, both sexes (%)</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E9%8A%80%E8%A1%8C" class="mw-redirect" title="世界银行">世界银行</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2020-02-13</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160410220937/http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SE.SEC.ENRR/countries/CN-4E-XT?display=graph">存档</a>于2016-04-10） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-660"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-660">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://news.cctv.com/2022/04/21/ARTI9EoN91BNXTqwarhf1JYq220421.shtml#:~:text=2021%E5%B9%B4%EF%BC%8C%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%B9%89%E5%8A%A1%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2,%E6%88%90%E6%89%8D%E5%A4%A7%E9%97%A8%E7%9A%84%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%E3%80%82">我国高等教育毛入学率达57.8%、在学总规模居世界第一</a>. 央视网. 2022-04-21 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2023-06-19</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220523083922/https://news.cctv.com/2022/04/21/ARTI9EoN91BNXTqwarhf1JYq220421.shtml#:~:text=2021%E5%B9%B4%EF%BC%8C%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%B9%89%E5%8A%A1%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2,%E6%88%90%E6%89%8D%E5%A4%A7%E9%97%A8%E7%9A%84%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E8%B7%AF%E5%BE%84%E3%80%82">存档</a>于2022-05-23）.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.atitle=%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E9%AB%98%E7%AD%89%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E6%AF%9B%E5%85%A5%E5%AD%A6%E7%8E%87%E8%BE%BE57.8%25%E3%80%81%E5%9C%A8%E5%AD%A6%E6%80%BB%E8%A7%84%E6%A8%A1%E5%B1%85%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80&amp;rft.date=2022-04-21&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E7%BD%91&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.cctv.com%2F2022%2F04%2F21%2FARTI9EoN91BNXTqwarhf1JYq220421.shtml%23%3A~%3Atext%3D2021%25E5%25B9%25B4%25EF%25BC%258C%25E4%25B8%25AD%25E5%259B%25BD%25E4%25B9%2589%25E5%258A%25A1%25E6%2595%2599%25E8%2582%25B2%2C%25E6%2588%2590%25E6%2589%258D%25E5%25A4%25A7%25E9%2597%25A8%25E7%259A%2584%25E9%2587%258D%25E8%25A6%2581%25E8%25B7%25AF%25E5%25BE%2584%25E3%2580%2582&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-661"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-661">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">袁小华. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://news.sciencenet.cn/htmlnews/2021/6/460488.shtm#:~:text=%E6%88%AA%E8%87%B32019%E5%B9%B4%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1,%E8%80%8C%E6%98%AF%E8%BF%9C%E8%BF%9C%E4%B8%8D%E5%A4%9F%E3%80%82">清华一年博士毕业生，抵美国十所名校总和？</a>. 科学网. 2021-06-29 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2022-04-23</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220523083928/https://news.sciencenet.cn/htmlnews/2021/6/460488.shtm#:~:text=%E6%88%AA%E8%87%B32019%E5%B9%B4%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1,%E8%80%8C%E6%98%AF%E8%BF%9C%E8%BF%9C%E4%B8%8D%E5%A4%9F%E3%80%82">存档</a>于2022-05-23）.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.atitle=%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%8E%E4%B8%80%E5%B9%B4%E5%8D%9A%E5%A3%AB%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%EF%BC%8C%E6%8A%B5%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%8D%81%E6%89%80%E5%90%8D%E6%A0%A1%E6%80%BB%E5%92%8C%EF%BC%9F&amp;rft.au=%E8%A2%81%E5%B0%8F%E5%8D%8E&amp;rft.date=2021-06-29&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E7%BD%91&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.sciencenet.cn%2Fhtmlnews%2F2021%2F6%2F460488.shtm%23%3A~%3Atext%3D%25E6%2588%25AA%25E8%2587%25B32019%25E5%25B9%25B4%25EF%25BC%258C%25E6%2588%2591%25E5%259B%25BD%25E7%25B4%25AF%25E8%25AE%25A1%2C%25E8%2580%258C%25E6%2598%25AF%25E8%25BF%259C%25E8%25BF%259C%25E4%25B8%258D%25E5%25A4%259F%25E3%2580%2582&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-670"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-670">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Dexter Roberts. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160208010845/http://www.bloomberg.com/bw/articles/2013-04-04/chinese-education-the-truth-behind-the-boasts">Chinese Education: The Truth Behind the Boasts</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E5%BD%AD%E5%8D%9A%E5%95%86%E4%B8%9A%E5%91%A8%E5%88%8A" title="彭博商业周刊">彭博商业周刊</a>》. 2013-04-04 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-22</span>&#93;</span>. （<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.bloomberg.com/bw/articles/2013-04-04/chinese-education-the-truth-behind-the-boasts">原始内容</a>存档于2016-02-08） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.au=Dexter+Roberts&amp;rft.btitle=Chinese+Education%3A+The+Truth+Behind+the+Boasts&amp;rft.date=2013-04-04&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E5%BD%AD%E5%8D%9A%E5%95%86%E6%A5%AD%E5%91%A8%E5%88%8A%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bloomberg.com%2Fbw%2Farticles%2F2013-04-04%2Fchinese-education-the-truth-behind-the-boasts&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-BuangChew2014-671"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-BuangChew2014_671-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation book">Buang, Sa'eda; Chew, Phyllis Ghim-Lian. Muslim Education in the 21st Century: Asian Perspectives. Routledge. 2014-05-09: 75. <a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-1-317-81500-6" title="Special:网络书源/978-1-317-81500-6"><span title="国际标准书号">ISBN</span>&#160;978-1-317-81500-6</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>. <q>后来，新中国以无神论及共产主义意识形态为基础。在此意识形态的框架内，宗教被视为“扭曲”的世界观，人们相信宗教随着人类社会的发展最终必然消失。20世纪50年代初至70年代末，中国共产党发动了一系列反宗教运动。在此30年间，教堂、寺庙和清真寺被关闭，其中的伊玛目被强制接受“再教育”。</q></cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.au=Chew%2C+Phyllis+Ghim-Lian&amp;rft.aufirst=Sa%27eda&amp;rft.aulast=Buang&amp;rft.btitle=Muslim+Education+in+the+21st+Century%3A+Asian+Perspectives&amp;rft.date=2014-05-09&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-317-81500-6&amp;rft.pages=75&amp;rft.pub=Routledge&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-672"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-672">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150812102019/http://www.sara.gov.cn/jqgk/zs/index.htm">国家宗教事务局简介</a>. <a href="/wiki/%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99%E4%BA%8B%E5%8B%99%E5%B1%80" class="mw-redirect" title="国家宗教事务局">国家宗教事务局</a>.  <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-22</span>&#93;</span>. （<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.sara.gov.cn/jqgk/zs/index.htm">原始内容</a>存档于2015-08-12） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到中文（简体）网页">（中文（简体））</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.btitle=%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99%E4%BA%8B%E5%8A%A1%E5%B1%80%E7%AE%80%E4%BB%8B&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E5%9C%8B%E5%AE%B6%E5%AE%97%E6%95%99%E4%BA%8B%E5%8B%99%E5%B1%80&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sara.gov.cn%2Fjqgk%2Fzs%2Findex.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-673"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-673">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="國際蓋洛普" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="WIN/GIA"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E8%93%8B%E6%B4%9B%E6%99%AE&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="国际盖洛普（页面不存在）">国际盖洛普</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WIN/GIA" class="extiw" title="en:WIN/GIA"><span lang="en" dir="auto">WIN/GIA</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/worldviews/files/2015/04/WIN.GALLUP-INTERNATIONAL-RELIGIOUSITY-INDEX.pdf">Q9. Irrespective of whether you attend a place of worship or not, would you say you are?</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E8%8F%AF%E7%9B%9B%E9%A0%93%E9%83%B5%E5%A0%B1" class="mw-redirect" title="华盛顿邮报">华盛顿邮报</a>》. 2015年4月 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-22</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ghostarchive.org/archive/20221009/https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/worldviews/files/2015/04/WIN.GALLUP-INTERNATIONAL-RELIGIOUSITY-INDEX.pdf">存档</a> <span style="font-size:85%;">(PDF)</span>于2022-10-09） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英语）</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.au=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E8%93%8B%E6%B4%9B%E6%99%AE%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22WIN%2FGIA%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3E%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B%E8%93%8B%E6%B4%9B%E6%99%AE%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EWIN%2FGIA%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft.btitle=Q9.+Irrespective+of+whether+you+attend+a+place+of+worship+or+not%2C+would+you+say+you+are%3F&amp;rft.date=2015-04&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%E3%80%8A%E8%8F%AF%E7%9B%9B%E9%A0%93%E9%83%B5%E5%A0%B1%E3%80%8B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.washingtonpost.com%2Fblogs%2Fworldviews%2Ffiles%2F2015%2F04%2FWIN.GALLUP-INTERNATIONAL-RELIGIOUSITY-INDEX.pdf&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-683"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-683">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">André Laliberté. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ciaonet.org/attachments/19403/uploads">Religion and the State in China: The Limits of Institutionalization</a>. 《<span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="中國當代問題研究期刊" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="Journal of Current Chinese Affairs"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E7%95%B6%E4%BB%A3%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%9C%9F%E5%88%8A&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="中国当代问题研究期刊（页面不存在）">中国当代问题研究期刊</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Journal_of_Current_Chinese_Affairs" class="extiw" title="en:Journal of Current Chinese Affairs"><span lang="en" dir="auto">Journal of Current Chinese Affairs</span></a></span>）</span></span>》. 2011年 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-22</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160204160251/https://www.ciaonet.org/attachments/19403/uploads">存档</a>于2016-02-04） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; <li id="cite_note-719"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-719">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Yuezhi Zhao. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=hHkza3TX-LIC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false">Media, Market, and Democracy in China: Between the Party Line and the Bottom Line</a>. 美国香槟: <a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%8A%E5%88%A9%E8%AF%BA%E4%BC%8A%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" title="伊利诺伊大学出版社">伊利诺伊大学出版社</a>. 1998年2月1日 [2016年1月24日]. <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749"><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0252066788" title="Special:网络书源/978-0252066788">978-0252066788</a> <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="英语">（英文）</span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-727"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-727">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Florin Badescu. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.mediafax.ro/externe/china-interzice-vedetelor-cu-reputatia-patata-sa-apara-pe-micul-si-marele-ecran-13374491">China interzice vedetelor cu reputaţia pătată să apară pe micul şi marele ecran</a>. <span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="Mediafax" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="Mediafax"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Mediafax&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Mediafax（页面不存在）">Mediafax</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mediafax" class="extiw" title="en:Mediafax"><span lang="en" dir="auto">Mediafax</span></a></span>）</span></span>. 2014-10-09 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-24</span>&#93;</span>. （原始内容<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160304234158/http://www.mediafax.ro/externe/china-interzice-vedetelor-cu-reputatia-patata-sa-apara-pe-micul-si-marele-ecran-13374491">存档</a>于2016-03-04） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#555; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到罗马尼亚语网页">（罗马尼亚语）</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzh.wikipedia.org%3A%E4%B8%AD%E5%8D%8E%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD&amp;rft.au=Florin+Badescu&amp;rft.btitle=China+interzice+vedetelor+cu+reputa%C5%A3ia+p%C4%83tat%C4%83+s%C4%83+apar%C4%83+pe+micul+%C5%9Fi+marele+ecran&amp;rft.date=2014-10-09&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.pub=%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-all+%22+data-orig-title%3D%22Mediafax%22+data-lang-code%3D%22en%22+data-lang-name%3D%22%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%22+data-foreign-title%3D%22Mediafax%22%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-page%22%3EMediafax%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22noprint+ilh-comment%22%3E%EF%BC%88%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-lang%22%3E%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-colon%22%3E%EF%BC%9A%3C%2Fspan%3E%3Cspan+class%3D%22ilh-link%22%3E-%7B%3Cspan+lang%3D%22en%22+dir%3D%22auto%22%3EMediafax%3C%2Fspan%3E%7D-%3C%2Fspan%3E%EF%BC%89%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fspan%3E&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mediafax.ro%2Fexterne%2Fchina-interzice-vedetelor-cu-reputatia-patata-sa-apara-pe-micul-si-marele-ecran-13374491&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook" class="Z3988"><span style="display:none;">&#160;</span></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-736"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-736">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160225032705/https://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P1-52919430.html">China sounds alarm over fast growing gap between rich and poor</a>. <span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="HighBeam Research" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="HighBeam Research"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=HighBeam_Research&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="HighBeam Research（页面不存在）">HighBeam Research</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HighBeam_Research" class="extiw" title="en:HighBeam Research"><span lang="en" dir="auto">HighBeam Research</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <a href="/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E8%81%AF%E7%A4%BE" class="mw-redirect" title="美联社">美联社</a>. 2002-05-11 <span class="reference-accessdate"> &#91;<span class="nowrap">2016-01-22</span>&#93;</span>. （<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P1-52919430.html">原始内容</a>存档于2016-02-25） <span style="font-family: sans-serif; </li>
<li id="cite_note-768"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-768">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="安德烈·利維 (漢學家)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="André Lévy (sinologist)"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%B7%E7%83%88%C2%B7%E5%88%A9%E7%B6%AD_(%E6%BC%A2%E5%AD%B8%E5%AE%B6)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="安德烈·利维 (汉学家)（页面不存在）">安德烈·利维</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_L%C3%A9vy_(sinologist)" class="extiw" title="en:André Lévy (sinologist)"><span lang="en" dir="auto">André Lévy (sinologist)</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <li id="cite_note-818"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-818">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.hosteltur.com/39955_turismo-china-supone-ya-61-pib.html">El turismo en China supone ya el 6,1% del PIB</a>. <h3><span id=".E6.9D.A5.E6.BA.90"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="来源">来源</span></h3>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r80540462">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul li{list-style:none}@media(max-width:720px){.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{padding-left:1.6em;text-indent:-1.6em}}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns ul{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-100{font-size:100%}</style><div class="refbegin" style="">
<dl><dt>书籍</dt></dl>
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="英语">（英文）</span> <a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%AC%E4%B8%81%C2%B7%E9%9B%85%E5%85%8B" title="马丁·雅克">马丁·雅克</a>. 《<a href="/wiki/%E7%95%B6%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B%E7%B5%B1%E6%B2%BB%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C" title="当中国统治世界">当中国统治世界</a>》（<i>When China Rules the World: The End of the Western World and the Birth of a New Global Order</i>）. 英国伦敦: <a href="/wiki/%E4%BC%81%E9%B9%85%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2" title="企鹅出版集团">企鹅出版集团</a>. 2009年11月12日. <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749"><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0521771245" title="Special:网络书源/978-0521771245">978-0521771245</a>.</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="英语">（英文）</span> <span class="ilh-all" data-orig-title="馬克·塞爾登" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-foreign-title="Mark Selden"><span class="ilh-page"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A6%AC%E5%85%8B%C2%B7%E5%A1%9E%E7%88%BE%E7%99%BB&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="马克·塞尔登（页面不存在）">马克·塞尔登</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Selden" class="extiw" title="en:Mark Selden"><span lang="en" dir="auto">Mark Selden</span></a></span>）</span></span>. <i>People's Republic of China: A Documentary History of Revolutionary Change</i>. 美国: 《<a href="/wiki/%E6%AF%8F%E6%9C%88%E8%AF%84%E8%AE%BA" title="每月评论">每月评论</a>》. 1979年1月1日. <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749"><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0853455325" title="Special:网络书源/978-0853455325">978-0853455325</a>.</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="英语">（英文）</span> Meng Fanhua. <i>The Phenomenon of Chinese Culture at the Turn of the 21st Century</i>. 新加坡: Silkroad Press. 2011年3月. <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749"><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-9814332354" title="Special:网络书源/978-9814332354">978-9814332354</a>.</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="英语">（英文）</span> Ye Sang. <i><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com.tw/books?id=PeMHhCCNPMwC&amp;printsec=frontcover&amp;hl=zh-TW#v=onepage&amp;q&amp;f=false">China Candid: The People on the People's Republic</a></i>. <a href="/wiki/%E5%A5%A5%E5%85%8B%E5%85%B0_(%E5%8A%A0%E5%88%A9%E7%A6%8F%E5%B0%BC%E4%BA%9A%E5%B7%9E)" title="奥克兰 (加利福尼亚州)">Oakland, CA</a>: <a href="/wiki/%E5%8A%A0%E5%88%A9%E7%A6%8F%E5%B0%BC%E4%BA%9E%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%B8%E5%87%BA%E7%89%88%E7%A4%BE" class="mw-redirect" title="加利福尼亚大学出版社">加利福尼亚大学出版社</a>. 2006年11月4日. <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r61200749"><a href="/wiki/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%A0%87%E5%87%86%E4%B9%A6%E5%8F%B7" title="国际标准书号">ISBN</a>&#160;<a href="/wiki/Special:%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%B9%A6%E6%BA%90/978-0520245143" title="Special:网络书源/978-0520245143">978-0520245143</a>.</li></ul>

<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="中文">（简体中文）</span><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.mnr.gov.cn/">中华人民共和国自然资源部</a> （<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20200129054601/http://www.mnr.gov.cn/">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
